lean_coffee.name: Lean Coffee
lean_coffee.description: A flexible discussion method without a fixed agenda. Ideal for identifying & discussing important topics.

quick_review.name: Quick Review
quick_review.description: Participants highlight positives & negatives incidents for quick identification of successes & issues.

status_quo_check.name: Status-quo-Check
status_quo_check.description: The team reflects on actions to start, stop, and continue, promoting continuous improvement.

start.name: Start
start.description: What new processes should be tried?

stop.name: Stop
stop.description: What isn't working and should be stopped?

continue.name: Continue
continue.description: What is working well and should be continued?

mood.name: Mood
mood.description: Participants share things that made them mad, sad, or glad. Good for understanding emotional states.

kalm.name: KALM
kalm.description: The team identifies what to keep, add, reduce, or amplify to enhance performance.

keep.name: Keep
keep.description: What works well and should be kept?

less.name: Less
less.description: What should be done less frequently?

more.name: More
more.description: What should be done more often?

4l.name: 4L
4l.description: Participants review what they liked, learned, lacked, and longed for, encouraging feedback.

longed_for.name: Longed for
longed_for.description: What would be desirable for the future?

swot.name: SWOT
swot.description: Analyzes strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats to support strategic planning.
